item-peanutbutterbread-spelt: Spelt bread slice with peanut butter
item-peanutbutterbread-rye: Rye bread slice with peanut butter
item-peanutbutterbread-flax: Flax bread slice with peanut butter
item-peanutbutterbread-rice: Rice bread slice with peanut butter
item-peanutbutterbread-sunflower: Sunflower bread slice with peanut butter
item-peanutbutterbread-amaranth: Amaranth bread slice with peanut butter
item-peanutbutterbread-cassava: Cassava bread slice with peanut butter
item-redmeatbread-*: Bread slice with cooked red meat
item-redmeatcheesesandwich-*: Cooked red meat and cheese sandwich
sammichesguide1-text:
What is Sammiches?
Sammiches adds sandwiches and other bread products into the game.

All sandwiches' bread type is decided through the bread type on the cutting board

Cutting Board
The cutting board is an essential tool, and required for nearly all recipes this mod adds. It can be crafted with 1 board of any wood in the crafting grid.

Sliced Bread
1 Knife
1 Bread loaf
Cutting board
1. Place the bread loaf on the cutting board.
2. Use the knife on the loaf to slice it into 4 bread slices

Peanut Butter Bread
1 Bowl of at least 0.1L peanut butter
1 Bread slice
Cutting board
1. Place bread slice on cutting board
2. Pour the peanut butter onto the bread slice

Honey Bread
1 Bread slice
1 Bowl with at least 0.1L of Honey
Cutting board
1. Place bread slice on cutting board
2. Pour bowl of honey onto the bread slice

Cheese Slice
1 Cheddar cheese slice
1 Knife
Cutting board
1. Place cheese slice on cutting board
2. Cut cheese slice with knife
Yields 2 slices of sandwich cheese

Cheese Bread
1 Bread slice
1 Cheese slice (Sliced from cutting board)
1. Place bread slice on cutting board
2. Place cheese slice on bread slice

Cheese Sandwich
1 Cheese bread
1 Bread slice
Cutting board
1. Place cheese bread on cutting board.
2. Place bread slice on top of cheese bread

Grilled Cheese Sandwich
1 Cheese sandwich
1 Oven
1. Preheat oven to 160C
2. Carefully place cheese sandwich into preheated oven
3. Wait
4. Remove sandwich from oven when dark brown

Peanut Butter and Honey Sandwich
1 Peanut butter bread
1 Honey bread
Cutting board
1. Place honey bread on cutting board
2. Place peanut butter bread on top

Cooked Red MeatSlice
1 Knife
1 Cooked red meat
Cutting board
1. Place cooked red meat on cutting board
2. Slice cooked red meat
Yields 2 cooked red meat slices

Red Meat Bread Slice
1 Cooked red meat slice
1 Bread slice
Cutting board
1. Place bread slice on cutting board
2. Place cooked red meat slice on bread

Cooked Red Meat Sandwich
1 Cooked red meat bread slice
1 Bread slice
Cutting board
1. Place cooked red meat bread slice on cutting board
2. Place bread slice on cooked red meat bread slice

Cooked Red Meat and Cheese Sandwich
1 Cooked red meat bread slice
1 Cheese bread slice
Cutting board
1. Place cooked red meat bread slice on cutting board
2. Place cheese bread slice on cooked red meat bread slice
